verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Swamy Yesu thana siluvanu mosi Saitanu rajyamu poortiga jayinche Neevunu Yesuni vembadi vellumaa O naa sodaraa venukaja veyaku O naa sodari venukanja veyaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shiramuna mundla makutamu dharinchi Sipaayiche talapai kottabade nee shirassu natle samarpinchu O Naa sodaraa vinukanja veyaku O naa sodari venukanjaveyaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokastulanta nidrinchu chundaga Mokaallapai Yesu kondapai nunde Neevunu praardhana shakthi nondumaa O naa sodaraa venukanja veyaku O naa sodari venukanja veyaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saahasamuna nee vaathma kadgamuna Saitanu bandhamu khandinchivesi Kristuni sangamaa mundanja veyumaa O naa sodaraa venukanja veyaku O naa sodari venukanja veyaku{/lang-eng}
